name: instagram-clone
author: Vinay Tambey
description: Vinstagram is a social-media platform for Gen-Alpha, where user can create, view, edit, and delete their posts. Each post consists of a photo and a caption. This project is just made by the intent of learning and practicing my backend (maybe, full-stack) web development skills, initially not using CSS styling or Databases, instead an array, but later I will be adding more features and styling to it.
